```lisp
[
  '(:action select ; Select an item and update its status
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?item))
    :effect (and (selected ?item)))',
  
  '(:action create ; Create an item and update task status
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?material - object)
    :precondition (and (selected ?material))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?item) (not (selected ?material))))',
  
  '(:action finish ; Complete a task by combining components
    :parameters (?p - person ?component1 - object ?component2 - object ?final_product - object)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?component1) (prepared ?component2))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?final_product) (not (inventory ?p ?component1))))'
]
```
